version_description: We've seen your recent feedback and in an effort to continuously improve the app, we've enhanced the capabilities of the scanner.
We've seen your recent feedback and in an effort to continuously improve the app, we've enhanced the capabilities of the scanner.

The OLG Lottery App now includes access to HIT OT MISS, a brand new mobile interactive lottery game. HIT OR MISS offers an immersive gameplay experience with animated draws every 5 minutes.

• Buy tickets at an OLG lottery retailer and scan in app to watch the draws
• $2 per play with draws every 5 minutes from 7AM-2AM
• Play up to 30 draws per ticket
• Win up to $250,000 by matching all or none of your numbers

Bug Fixes and Performance Improvements
Bug Fixes and Performance Improvements

The OLG Lottery App now includes the ability to opt into draw reminders for individual games, based on a Jackpot threshold. At this time, the following games will support the threshold reminder feature:
● LOTTOMAX
● LOTTO 6/49
● LOTTARIO
● POKER LOTTO: All In

We’ve also seen your recent feedback and in an effort to continuously improve the app, we’ve given you the ability to turn on/off the winning sound.

The OLG Lottery App now includes the ability to opt into draw reminders for individual games, based on a Jackpot threshold. At this time, the following games will support the threshold reminder feature:
● LOTTOMAX
● LOTTO 6/49
● LOTTARIO
● POKER LOTTO: All In

We’ve also seen your recent feedback and in an effort to continuously improve the app, we’ve given you the ability to turn on/off the winning sound.
Bug Fixes and Performance Improvements
Bug Fixes and Performance Improvements
The OLG Lottery App now includes the ability to create or sign in to your Winner's Edge account. Signing in to your account will give you access to eCoupons and the inside scoop on Lottery News.
